name: open2300
short_description: open2300 - reads/writes data from the Lacrosse WS2300 family of weather stations. Includes tools that send data to: logfiles, webpages with graphs, XML file, MySQL, Weather Underground, Citizen Weather. Library of 50+ functions for your own programs (C)
